20110127222705.000|20110127222706.000|CC1|          THERE YOU GO.         
20110127222706.000|20110127222739.000|CC1|   GO National. GO LIKE A PRO.  
20110127222739.000|20110127222740.000|CC1|   [ Male Announcer ] If you've 
20110127222740.000|20110127222741.000|CC1|   had a heart attack caused by 
20110127222741.000|20110127222743.000|CC1|   a completely blocked artery, 
20110127222743.000|20110127222743.000|CC1|  another heart attack could be 
20110127222743.000|20110127222746.000|CC1|   lurking, waiting to strike.  
20110127222746.000|20110127222746.000|CC1|          A heart attack        
20110127222746.000|20110127222749.000|CC1|     that's caused by a clot,   
20110127222749.000|20110127222751.000|CC1|     one that could be fatal.   
20110127222751.000|20110127222753.000|CC1|   But PLAVIX helps save lives. 
20110127222753.000|20110127222753.000|CC1|        PLAVIX, taken with      
20110127222753.000|20110127222754.000|CC1|      other heart medicines,    
20110127222754.000|20110127222754.000|CC1|      goes beyond what other    
20110127222754.000|20110127222757.000|CC1|    heart medicines do alone,   
20110127222757.000|20110127222757.000|CC1|  to provide greater protection 
20110127222757.000|20110127222759.000|CC1|       against heart attack     
20110127222759.000|20110127222801.000|CC1|     or stroke and even death   
20110127222801.000|20110127222801.000|CC1|            by helping          
20110127222801.000|20110127222802.000|CC1|     to keep blood platelets    
20110127222802.000|20110127222802.000|CC1|      from sticking together    
20110127222802.000|20110127222805.000|CC1|   and forming dangerous clots. 
20110127222805.000|20110127222805.000|CC1|         Ask your doctor        
20110127222805.000|20110127222808.000|CC1|   if PLAVIX is right for you.  
20110127222808.000|20110127222808.000|CC1|      Protection that helps     
20110127222808.000|20110127222810.000|CC1|           save lives.          
20110127222810.000|20110127222825.000|CC1|S                               
20110127222825.000|20110127222825.000|CC1|  People with stomach ulcers or 
20110127222825.000|20110127222827.000|CC1|  conditions that cause bleeding
20110127222827.000|20110127222829.000|CC1|      should not use PLAVIX.    
20110127222829.000|20110127222829.000|CC1|       Taking PLAVIX alone      
20110127222829.000|20110127222831.000|CC1|  or with some other medicines, 
20110127222831.000|20110127222831.000|CC1|        including aspirin,      
20110127222831.000|20110127222834.000|CC1|   may increase bleeding risk,  
20110127222834.000|20110127222834.000|CC1|       so tell your doctor      
20110127222834.000|20110127222836.000|CC1|      when planning surgery.    
20110127222836.000|20110127222836.000|CC1|         Tell your doctor       
20110127222836.000|20110127222837.000|CC1|     all medicines you take,    
20110127222837.000|20110127222837.000|CC1|  including aspirin, especially 
20110127222837.000|20110127222840.000|CC1|     if you've had a stroke.    
20110127222840.000|20110127222840.000|CC1|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20110127222840.000|20110127222842.000|CC1|      or confusion develops,    
20110127222842.000|20110127222844.000|CC1|    tell your doctor promptly.  
20110127222844.000|20110127222846.000|CC1|    These may be signs of TTP,  
20110127222846.000|20110127222846.000|CC1|      a rare but potentially    
20110127222846.000|20110127222848.000|CC1|   life-threatening condition,  
20110127222848.000|20110127222848.000|CC1|   reported sometimes less than 
20110127222848.000|20110127222851.000|CC1|  2 weeks after starting PLAVIX.
20110127222851.000|20110127222851.000|CC1|     Other rare but serious     
20110127222851.000|20110127222911.000|CC1|     side effects may occur.
